description: Alpha-v7 is the next-generation RLNC implementation focusing on real-world network resilience, hardware-aware optimization, and high-throughput streaming.
purpose: To provide a low-latency, resilient data transmission framework capable of recovering lost information in hostile network environments without retransmission.

key_features.detail: Offloads CPU-intensive encoding/decoding to background worker threads.
Utilizes BigUint64Array for vectorized 64-bit XOR operations in JavaScript.
Manages data generations for continuous transmission flow.
Real-time jitter, latency, and burst loss simulation for reliability testing.
